sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { Card, CardBody } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import "./tour-card.css" import calculateAvgRating from "../utils/avgRating" const TourCard = ({ tour }) => { const { _id, title, city, photo, featured, reviews , price} = tour const {avgRating,totalRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews); return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating} {totalRating===0?("Not rated"):(({reviews.length}))}
{title}
${price} /per person
) } export default TourCard
